types.description: Choose 15 numbers to bet on the lotofácil. You win by matching 11, 12, 13, 14 or 15 numbers. There are many chances to win, and now you play wherever you are!
Choose 6 numbers from the 60 available in the mega-sena. Win with 6, 5 or 4 hits. There are two weekly draws for you to bet and hope to become a millionaire.
Choose 5 numbers from the 80 available on the corner. 5, 4, 3 or 2 hits. There are six weekly draws and six chances to win.
